context.Nepali: एउटा समुदायका ५०० मानिसहरूमा गरिएको सर्वेक्षणमा, २५० जनाले चिया मन पराउँछन्, ३०० जनाले कफी मन पराउँछन् र १०० जनाले दुवै मन पराउँछन् ।
context.English: In a survey of 500 people in a community, 250 like tea, 300 like coffee and 100 like both.

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा एउटा पेय पदार्थ मन पराउने मानिसहरूको संख्या कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of people who like at least one drink.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कम्तीमा एउटा मन पराउने भनेको समूहहरूको मिलन ($T \cup C$) हो । सूत्र $n(T \cup C) = n(T) + n(C) - n(T \cap C)$ प्रयोग गर्दा: $250 + 300 - 100 = 450$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the number of people who like at least one drink, we calculate the union of the sets using the formula $n(T \cup C) = n(T) + n(C) - n(T \cap C)$. Substituting the values: $250 + 300 - 100 = 450$.
Citation: Chapter 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: कुनै पनि पेय पदार्थ मन नपराउने मानिसहरूको संख्या निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of people who like neither tea nor coffee.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कुनै पनि मन नपराउने संख्या निकाल्न, जम्मा संख्या ($U$) बाट कम्तीमा एउटा मन पराउने ($T \cup C$) घटाउनुपर्छ । $n(U) - n(T \cup C) = 500 - 450 = 50$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The number of people who like neither is the complement of the union. Subtract the union from the total population: $n(U) - n(T \cup C) = 500 - 450 = 50$.
Citation: Chapter 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: चिया मात्र मन पराउने मानिसहरूको संख्या पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of people who like tea only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चिया मात्र ($n_0(T)$) निकाल्न, चिया मन पराउने जम्मा संख्याबाट दुवै मन पराउने संख्या घटाउनुपर्छ । $n(T) - n(T \cap C) = 250 - 100 = 150$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the number of people who like only tea ($n_0(T)$), subtract those who like both from the total number of people who like tea: $250 - 100 = 150$.
Citation: Chapter 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: चिया मात्र मन पराउने र कफी मात्र मन पराउने मानिसहरूको अनुपात निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the ratio of people who like tea only to those who like coffee only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिलो, कफी मात्र = $300 - 100 = 200$ । चिया मात्र = $150$ । अनुपात $150 : 200$ हुन्छ । यसलाई ५० ले भाग गरेर सरल गर्दा $3 : 4$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First calculate Coffee Only: $300 - 100 = 200$. We know Tea Only is $150$. The ratio is $150 : 200$, which simplifies to $3 : 4$.
Citation: Chapter 1

context.Nepali: रामले रु. ८०,००० दुई वर्षका लागि १२% वार्षिक ब्याजदरमा ऋण लियो ।
context.English: Ram took a loan of Rs. 80,000 for 2 years at 12% annual interest rate.

sub_questions.questionNepali: वार्षिक चक्रीय मिश्रधन निकाल्ने सूत्र लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the formula to calculate annual compound amount.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चक्रीय मिश्रधन ($CA$) निकाल्ने मानक सूत्र $P(1 + R/100)^T$ हो, जहाँ P मूलधन, R ब्याजदर र T समय हो ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय २
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The standard formula for Compound Amount is $CA = P(1 + R/100)^T$, where P is Principal, R is Rate, and T is Time.
Citation: Chapter 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: २ वर्षमा हुने चक्रीय ब्याज पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the compound interest in 2 years.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the formula $CI = P[(1 + R/100)^T - 1]$: Substitute values to get $80000[(1.12)^2 - 1]$. This simplifies to $80000(0.2544)$, which equals Rs. 20,352.
Citation: Chapter 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: वार्षिक चक्रीय ब्याज र साधारण ब्याजको अन्तर पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the difference between annual compound interest and simple interest.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, calculate Simple Interest: $SI = (P \times T \times R)/100 = 19,200$. Then find the difference: $CI - SI = 20,352 - 19,200 = 1,152$.
Citation: Chapter 2

context.Nepali: एउटा मोटरसाइकलको हालको मूल्य रु. २,५०,००० छ । यदि यसको मूल्य ह्रास दर १०% प्रति वर्ष छ भने:
context.English: The present price of a motorcycle is Rs. 2,50,000. If its depreciation rate is 10% per annum:

sub_questions.questionNepali: २ वर्षपछिको मूल्य कति हुन्छ ? पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the price after 2 years.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the compound depreciation formula $V_T = V_0(1 - R/100)^T$: $250000(0.9)^2 = 250000 \times 0.81 = 2,02,500$.
Citation: Chapter 3

sub_questions.questionNepali: २ वर्षमा कुल कति रकम ह्रास भयो ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the total depreciated amount in 2 years?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
ह्रास रकम निकाल्न सुरुको मूल्यबाट अन्तिम मूल्य घटाउनुपर्छ । $2,50,000 - 2,02,500 = 47,500$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the depreciated amount, subtract the final price from the initial price: $2,50,000 - 2,02,500 = 47,500$.
Citation: Chapter 3

sub_questions.questionNepali: कति वर्षपछि मोटरसाइकलको मूल्य रु. १,८२,२५० हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: After how many years will the price be Rs. 1,82,250?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the formula: $182250 = 250000(0.9)^T$. Dividing gives $0.729 = (0.9)^T$. Since $0.9^3 = 0.729$, the time is $T = 3$ years.
Citation: Chapter 3

context.Nepali: एउटा व्यापारीले अमेरिकी डलर ८०० लाई ने.रु. १३२ को दरले साट्यो । एक हप्तापछि नेपाली मुद्राको ५% अवमूल्यन भयो ।
context.English: A merchant exchanged US $800 at the rate of NRs. 132. After a week, Nepali currency was devalued by 5%.

sub_questions.questionNepali: अवमूल्यन पछिको नयाँ विनिमय दर कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the new exchange rate after devaluation?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अवमूल्यनको अर्थ ने.रु. कमजोर हुनु हो, जसले गर्दा डलरको मूल्य बढ्छ । नयाँ दर = $132 + (5\% \text{ of } 132) = 132 + 6.60 = 138.60$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय २
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Devaluation means the currency gets weaker, so the exchange rate increases. New Rate = $132 + 5\% \text{ of } 132 = 132 + 6.60 = 138.60$.
Citation: Chapter 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: अब सोही डलर साट्दा कति नाफा हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How much profit is made if the dollars are exchanged now?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Profit per dollar is the difference in rates: $138.60 - 132 = 6.60$. Total Profit = $800 \times 6.60 = 5,280$.
Citation: Chapter 2

context.Nepali: एउटा वर्ग आधार भएको पिरामिडको आधारको क्षेत्रफल ६४ वर्ग से.मि. र उचाइ १५ से.मि. छ ।
context.English: The area of the base of a square-based pyramid is 64 sq. cm and height is 15 cm.

sub_questions.questionNepali: सो पिरामिडको आधारको भुजाको लम्बाइ कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the length of the side of the base of the pyramid?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
आधार वर्गाकार छ, त्यसैले $Area = a^2$ । $64 = a^2$ हुँदा, भुजा $a = \sqrt{64} = 8$ से.मि. हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since the base is square, $Area = a^2$. Given $a^2 = 64$, the side length is $a = \sqrt{64} = 8$ cm.
Citation: Chapter 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the volume of the pyramid.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पिरामिडको आयतनको सूत्र $V = \frac{1}{3} \times A \times h$ हो । मान राख्दा: $\frac{1}{3} \times 64 \times 15 = 320$ घन से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The volume formula is $V = \frac{1}{3} \times \text{Base Area} \times \text{Height}$. Calculating: $\frac{1}{3} \times 64 \times 15 = 320$ cm³.
Citation: Chapter 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the slant height of the pyramid.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Use the relation $l^2 = h^2 + (a/2)^2$. Substituting values: $l = \sqrt{15^2 + 4^2} = \sqrt{241} \approx 15.52$ cm.
Citation: Chapter 5

context.Nepali: एउटा आइसक्रिम सोली र अर्धगोला मिलेर बनेको छ । यदि सोलीको अर्धव्यास २१ से.मि. र आइसक्रिमको जम्मा आयतन ३२,३४० घन से.मि. छ भने:
context.English: An ice cream is composed of a cone and a hemisphere. If the radius of the base is 21 cm and the total volume is 32,340 cm³:

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the formula for the combined volume.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कुल आयतन भनेको सोलीको आयतन ($\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$) र अर्धगोलाको आयतन ($\frac{2}{3}\pi r^3$) को योगफल हो ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The total volume is the sum of the volume of the cone ($\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$) and the volume of the hemisphere ($\frac{2}{3}\pi r^3$).
Citation: Chapter 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the height of the conical part.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the volume formula: $32340 = \frac{1}{3}\pi (21)^2 (h + 42)$. Solving for h: $32340 = 462(h+42) \Rightarrow 70 = h+42 \Rightarrow h=28$.
Citation: Chapter 5

context.Nepali: एउटा आयताकार कोठाको लम्बाइ १२ मिटर, चौडाइ ८ मिटर र उचाइ ३ मिटर छ ।
context.English: A rectangular room has length 12 m, breadth 8 m, and height 3 m.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the area of the floor of the room?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
भुइँको क्षेत्रफल निकाल्न लम्बाइ र चौडाइ गुणन गरिन्छ: $12 \times 8 = 96$ वर्ग मिटर ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Floor area is calculated as Length $\times$ Breadth: $12 \times 8 = 96$ sq. m.
Citation: Chapter 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: चार भित्तामा रङ लगाउँदा प्रति वर्ग मिटर रु. १५ का दरले जम्मा खर्च कति लाग्ला ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If painting cost is Rs. 15 per sq. m, what is the total cost for 4 walls?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चार भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल $A = 2h(l+b) = 2(3)(12+8) = 6(20) = 120$ वर्ग मि. । जम्मा खर्च = क्षेत्रफल $\times$ दर = $120 \times 15 = 1,800$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, find the area of 4 walls: $2h(l+b) = 6(20) = 120$. Total Cost = Area $\times$ Rate = $120 \times 15 = 1,800$.
Citation: Chapter 5

context.Nepali: अंकगणितीय श्रेणी १ + २ + ३ + ... को पहिलो २० पदहरूको योगफल पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
context.English: Find the sum of the first 20 terms of the arithmetic series 1 + 2 + 3 + ...

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the formula to find the sum.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अंकगणितीय श्रेणीको योगफल निकाल्ने मानक सूत्र $S_n = \frac{n}{2}[2a + (n-1)d]$ हो ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The standard formula for the sum of an arithmetic series is $S_n = \frac{n}{2}[2a + (n-1)d]$.
Citation: Chapter 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the sum.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute $a=1, d=1, n=20$ into the formula: $S_{20} = 10(2 + 19) = 210$.
Citation: Chapter 6

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि योगफल ४६५ भयो भने पद संख्या कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If the sum is 465, find the number of terms.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
प्राकृतिक संख्याको योगफल $S_n = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$ प्रयोग गर्दा: $465 = \frac{n(n+1)}{2} \Rightarrow 930 = n^2 + n$ । $n^2 + n - 930 = 0$ हल गर्दा $n=30$ आउँछ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using sum of natural numbers formula: $465 = n(n+1)/2 \Rightarrow n^2 + n - 930 = 0$. Factoring gives $(n+31)(n-30)=0$, so $n=30$.
Citation: Chapter 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What type of equation is this?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चर राशि $x$ को उच्चतम घाताङ्क २ भएकोले यो वर्ग समीकरण हो ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since the highest power of the variable x is 2, it is a Quadratic Equation.
Citation: Chapter 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Solve it.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
मध्य पद $-3x$ लाई $-5x + 2x$ मा विच्छेद गरौँ । $x(x-5) + 2(x-5) = 0 \Rightarrow (x-5)(x+2) = 0$ । त्यसैले $x=5$ वा $x=-2$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Splitting the middle term: $x^2 - 5x + 2x - 10 = 0$. Factoring gives $(x-5)(x+2) = 0$. Thus, $x = 5$ or $x = -2$.
Citation: Chapter 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Verify.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute $x=5$: $25 - 15 - 10 = 0$. Substitute $x=-2$: $4 + 6 - 10 = 0$. Both values satisfy the equation.
Citation: Chapter 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Simplify.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$3^{x+1}$ लाई $3^x \times 3$ मा छुट्याउनुहोस् । $2^x \times 3^x \times 3 = 18 \Rightarrow (2 \times 3)^x = 18/3 \Rightarrow 6^x = 6$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ९
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Break $3^{x+1}$ into $3^x \cdot 3$. Combine bases with same exponent: $(2 \cdot 3)^x \cdot 3 = 18$. Divide by 3 to get $6^x = 6$.
Citation: Chapter 9

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$6^x = 6^1$ । आधार समान भएकोले घाताङ्क पनि बराबर हुन्छ, त्यसैले $x = 1$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय ९
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since $6^x = 6^1$, equating the exponents gives $x = 1$.
Citation: Chapter 9

context.Nepali: समानान्तर चतुर्भुज PQRS को क्षेत्रफल ४८ वर्ग से.मि. छ । एउटै आधारमा बनेको त्रिभुज QTR छ ।
context.English: Area of parallelogram PQRS is 48 sq. cm. Triangle QTR is on the same base.

sub_questions.questionNepali: त्रिभुज र समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफल सम्बन्ध लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write relation between area of triangle and parallelogram.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
एउटै आधार र उही समानान्तर रेखाहरू बिच बनेको त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको आधा हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
A triangle on the same base and between the same parallels as a parallelogram has half the area of the parallelogram.
Citation: Chapter 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find area of triangle QTR.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{2} \times 48 = 24$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times$ Parallelogram Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times 48 = 24$ sq. cm.
Citation: Chapter 10

context.Nepali: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज ABCD मा $\angle A = (2x+10)$ र $\angle C = (3x-5)$।
context.English: In cyclic quad ABCD, $\angle A = (2x+10)$ and $\angle C = (3x-5)$.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the relationship.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चक्रीय चतुर्भुजका सम्मुख कोणहरूको योगफल १८० डिग्री हुन्छ (सम्पूरक) ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Opposite angles of a cyclic quadrilateral sum to 180 degrees (are supplementary).
Citation: Chapter 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$(2x+10) + (3x-5) = 180 \Rightarrow 5x + 5 = 180 \Rightarrow 5x = 175 \Rightarrow x = 35$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Summing the angles: $2x+10 + 3x-5 = 180$. Solving $5x+5=180$ gives $x=35$.
Citation: Chapter 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find $\angle A$.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute $x=35$ into $2x+10$: $2(35)+10 = 80$ degrees.
Citation: Chapter 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What type of triangle? Give reason.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since $6^2 + 8^2 = 100 = 10^2$, the sides satisfy Pythagoras theorem. It is a right-angled triangle.
Citation: Chapter 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Area.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
समकोण त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{2} \times \text{base} \times \text{height} = \frac{1}{2} \times 6 \times 8 = 24$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times 6 \times 8 = 24$ sq. cm.
Citation: Chapter 10

context.Nepali: टावरको उचाइ र छायाको लम्बाइ बराबर छ ।
context.English: Height of tower equals length of shadow.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the angle of elevation?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\tan \theta = \text{Height} / \text{Base} = 1$ । $\tan 45^\circ = 1$ भएकोले कोण $45^\circ$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since Height = Base, $\tan \theta = 1$. This implies $\theta = 45^\circ$.
Citation: Chapter 15

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि छायाको लम्बाइ ३० मि. छ भने टावरको उचाइ कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If shadow is 30m, what is the height?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
उचाइ र छाया बराबर भएकोले, उचाइ पनि ३० मिटर नै हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since height equals shadow length, the height is also 30 m.
Citation: Chapter 15

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write median formula.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
व्यक्तिगत श्रेणीको लागि मध्यिकाको स्थान निकाल्ने सूत्र $(N+1)/2$ औं पद हो ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
For individual series, the median is the $(N+1)/2$-th item.
Citation: Chapter 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Q1.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Sort data: 10, 11, 12... N=11. $Q_1$ is the $(11+1)/4 = 3$rd item. The 3rd value is 12.
Citation: Chapter 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Quartile Deviation.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First find $Q_3 = 22$. Quartile Deviation formula is $(Q_3 - Q_1)/2$. So, $(22 - 12)/2 = 5$.
Citation: Chapter 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: List the sample space outcomes.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
३ सिक्काका कुल ८ परिणाम: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT} ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The sample space consists of $2^3=8$ outcomes: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}.
Citation: Chapter 14

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा २ टाउको आउने सम्भाव्यता कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Probability of at least 2 heads.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अनुकूल परिणामहरू: {HHH, HHT, HTH, THH} (४ वटा) । सम्भाव्यता = $4/8 = 1/2$ ।
उद्धरण: अध्याय १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Favorable outcomes (at least 2 heads): {HHH, HHT, HTH, THH}. Count = 4. Probability = $4/8 = 1/2$.
Citation: Chapter 14
